title: Two Bed Apartment for Sale in Colombo 06
details:
SAVE 15% VAT BY PURCHASING YOUR APARTMENT BEFORE 31st MARCH 2018.

Summer 64 Luxury Apartments

Developer - Summerland Holdings
Location - 64, Suvisuddharama Road, Colombo 06
Estimated Completion - December 2019
Availability - 60% Sold
Status - Construction in Progress
Bedrooms - 2 & 3 Bedroom Units
Sizes - 1,195 to 1,680 Square Feet
Two Bed Starting Price - LKR 23.9 Million
Three Bed Starting Price - LKR 28.9 Million

Conveniently located in the heart of Wellawatte on Suvisuddharama Road within close proximity to all modern day conveniences. Strategically positioned in a quiet & residential location yet only 300 meters away from Havelock Road. Summer 64 offers a combination of two and three bedroom apartments all providing generous living accommodation.

Each apartment has been meticulously designed to maximise living space while providing all essential comforts. Summer 64 also offers a wide range of shared facilities and amenities which include a swimming pool, gym, children's play area and a large recreation space on the roof top.

Interior
- Designer porcelain tiles. All balconies with non-slip tiles.
- Energy saving A/C unit for master bedroom. A/C provisions for other rooms & living area.
- Imported LED light fittings & three phase power supply.

Bathrooms
- All bathroom fittings will be of an reputed international standard.
- Tempered glass shower cubicle for master bedroom.
- Individual hot water geyser for all bathrooms except servant’s bathroom.

Kitchen
- Stainless steel dual bowl sink with hot and cold mixture tap.
- Fitted pantry cupboards with cooker and provisions for oven, dishwasher and refrigerator.

Common Area
- Swimming pool and 1,600 square foot recreational area.
- Reception with CCTV surveillance.
- Standby generator.
- Drivers rest area with washroom.
- Covered parking slot for each unit with limited additional slots on request.
- High ceiling for extra comfort.
- Separate passenger and service elevator capable of stretcher transport.
- Individually metered electric charging point for every car parking slot.

Location
- Address: 64, Suvisuddharama Road, Colombo 06
- 300 meters away from Havelock Road
- 300 meters away from W A. Silva Mawatha
